transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Haa sir, Himanshu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kal baat hui thi aap se.
Kab?
Maurya sir Himanshu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kal baat hui thi na aap se sir.
Haa haa.
Ji ji sir usko karte sir pricing achha kar diya hai baki logo se 70000 plus GST le rahe hai.
